class.name: com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.Visit
class.query: select visit from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.Visit visit join visit.registration cpr where cpr.id = :cprId and visit.status = 'Complete' order by visit.visitDate desc, visit.id desc

select distinct v from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.Visit v join v.registration reg join reg.collectionProtocol cp join reg.participant p left join p.pmis pmi where (lower(p.empi) = :empiOrMrn or lower(pmi.medicalRecordNumber) = :empiOrMrn) and cp.id = :cpId
select v from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.Visit v join v.registration reg join reg.collectionProtocol cp where lower(v.surgicalPathologyNumber) = :sprNo and cp.id = :cpId
class.sql-query:
select t.visit_id as visitId, count(distinct case when t.status = 'Pending' then t.id else null end) as totalPendingSpmns, count(distinct case when t.lineage = 'New' and t.status = 'Pending' then t.id else null end) as pendingPrimarySpmns, count(distinct case when t.lineage = 'New' and t.planned = 'Y' and t.status = 'Collected' then t.id else null end) as plannedPrimarySpmnsColl, count(distinct case when t.lineage = 'New' and t.planned = 'N' and t.status = 'Collected' then t.id else null end) as unplannedPrimarySpmnsColl, count(distinct case when t.lineage = 'New' and (t.status = 'Missed Collection' or t.status = 'Not Collected') then t.id else null end) as missedPrimarySpmnsColl, count(distinct case when t.spmn_stored = 'Y' then t.id else null end) as storedSpmns, count(distinct case when t.activity_status != 'Closed' and t.status = 'Collected' and t.spmn_stored = 'N' and t.spmn_distributed = 'N' then t.id else null end) as notStoredSpmns, count(distinct case when t.spmn_distributed = 'Y' then t.id else null end) as distributedSpmns, count(distinct case when t.activity_status = 'Closed' and t.spmn_distributed = 'N' then t.id else null end) as closedSpmns from ( select v.identifier as visit_id, case when s.lineage is not null then s.lineage else req.lineage end as lineage, s.activity_status as activity_status, case when s.collection_status is not null then s.collection_status else 'Pending' end as status, 'Y' as planned, case when p.identifier is null then 'N' else 'Y' end as spmn_stored, case when oi.identifier is null then 'N' else 'Y' end as spmn_distributed, case when s.identifier is not null then concat('s', s.identifier) else concat('sr', req.identifier) end as id from catissue_specimen_coll_group v inner join catissue_cp_req_specimen req on req.collection_protocol_event_id = v.collection_protocol_event_id and req.activity_status != 'Disabled' left join catissue_specimen s on s.specimen_collection_group_id = v.identifier and s.req_specimen_id = req.identifier and s.activity_status != 'Disabled' left join os_container_positions p on p.occupying_specimen_id = s.identifier left join os_order_items oi on oi.specimen_id = s.identifier left join os_orders o on o.identifier = oi.order_id and o.status = 'EXECUTED' and o.activity_status != 'Disabled' where v.identifier in (:visitIds) and (req.activity_status = 'Active' or s.identifier is not null)
union select s.specimen_collection_group_id as visit_id, s.lineage as lineage, s.activity_status as activity_status, s.collection_status as status, 'N' as planned, case when p.identifier is null then 'N' else 'Y' end as spmn_stored, case when oi.identifier is null then 'N' else 'Y' end as spmn_distributed, concat('s', s.identifier) as id from catissue_specimen s left join os_container_positions p on p.occupying_specimen_id = s.identifier left join os_order_items oi on oi.specimen_id = s.identifier left join os_orders o on o.identifier = oi.order_id and o.status = 'EXECUTED' and o.activity_status != 'Disabled' where s.specimen_collection_group_id in (:visitIds) and s.activity_status != 'Disabled' and s.req_specimen_id is null ) t group by t.visit_id

select cpe.identifier as eventId, count(req.identifier) as totalSpmns, count(case when req.lineage = 'New' then req.identifier else null end) as primarySpmns from catissue_coll_prot_event cpe inner join catissue_cp_req_specimen req on req.collection_protocol_event_id = cpe.identifier where cpe.identifier in (:eventIds) and cpe.activity_status != 'Disabled' and req.activity_status = 'Active' group by cpe.identifier
